task.summary: Deleted unneeded third-party code. JSP imports changed. persistence.xml adjusted.
Refactoring. Added two properties to Lesson with corresponding select forms to view.
Refactoring. Added two properties to Lesson with corresponding select forms to view.
dayOfWeek and number properties of Lesson changed to enum. Database data types adjusted.
Altered JPA relationships of Lesson's properties. Added filter to set encoding of characters in POST request to UTF-8.
LessonType enum added with the corresponding select form.
JPA relationships between Lesson and Group, Lesson and Instructor made bidirectional. Declared new "find" methods in LessonRepository.
JPA relationships between Lesson and Group, Lesson and Instructor made bidirectional. Declared new "find" methods in LessonRepository.
JPA relationships between Lesson and Group, Lesson and Instructor made bidirectional. Declared new "find" methods in LessonRepository.

Implemented schedule search by group and instructor. Added GroupService, InstructorService, GroupSearchForm and InstructorSearchForm classes. Implemented SearchController. Adjusted ScheduleController. Added two select forms on index page.
Changed URLs to be compliant with REST. Made corresponding changes to ScheduleController and SearchController. Slightly altered JSP. Added convenience method to GroupService and InstructorService.
Implemented authorization (without storing User in database yet).

MESSAGE.value: Deleted unneeded third-party code. JSP imports changed. persistence.xml adjusted.
Refactoring. Added two properties to Lesson with corresponding select forms to view.
dayOfWeek and number properties of Lesson changed to enum. Database data types adjusted.
Altered JPA relationships of Lesson's properties. Added filter to set encoding of characters in POST request to UTF-8.
LessonType enum added with the corresponding select form.
JPA relationships between Lesson and Group, Lesson and Instructor made bidirectional. Declared new "find" methods in LessonRepository.

Implemented schedule search by group and instructor. Added GroupService, InstructorService, GroupSearchForm and InstructorSearchForm classes. Implemented SearchController. Adjusted ScheduleController. Added two select forms on index page.
Changed URLs to be compliant with REST. Made corresponding changes to ScheduleController and SearchController. Slightly altered JSP. Added convenience method to GroupService and InstructorService.
Implemented authorization (without storing User in database yet).

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Implemented authorization (without storing User in database yet).
